line item receiving %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides%
%project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% line item receiving document identifies the specific items (quantities) that have been received on a specific shipment for a po

when the line item receiving is required the requisition initiator checked the receiving required box on the requisition document in the items tab, item type field, if the quantity or quantity (nontaxable) was selected purchase of capital asset equipment occurred for items at or above $5000 the total amount of order is greater than $10,000 %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% sstephen

when the line cannot be used the item type field, is set to no quantity (taxable) or no quantity (nontaxable) the line item receiving document can only be used for quantity based orders %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% sstephen
when to complete the line item receiving %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% complete the line item receiving document before submitting the payment request sstephen
exception when payments are required before delivery %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% sstephen
who can complete the rcv document any kfs user user who processes preq %project.slidenumber% of %project.totalslides% person who receives or signs for the items sstephen
